description:
Public Sans is based off of an interpretation and expansion of the 1912 Morris Fuller Benton classic and developed by the United States Web Design System.
    
![Public Sans sample](https://blogfonts.com/fonts/p/980/161980/img/public-sans-s0.png)
summary: A strong, neutral typeface for interfaces, text, and headings.
author: U.S. Web Design System (USWDS)
